About bodHOST:
bodHOST established in 1999 as a web hosting company offers a wide array of value for money web hosting services including Linux/Windows Shared Hosting, Reseller Hosting, Cloud Hosting, Virtual Private Servers (VPS), Dedicated Servers, SSL and Offsite Backup Solutions. 24x7x365 technical support is available and 99.95% uptime guarantee is offered as standard features with US-based servers.
